present.english: The talented artist draws the big house
The young students draw the big mountain

imperfect.english: I was drawing the beautiful picture
The talented artist was drawing the big house
The young students were drawing the big mountain

future.english: I will draw the beautiful picture
The talented artist will draw the big house
The young students will draw the big mountain

aorist.english: The talented artist drew the big house
The young students drew the big mountain

optative.english: I should draw the beautiful picture

optative.georgian: ნიჭიერმა ხელოვანმა უნდა დახატოს დიდი სახლი
optative.english: The talented artist should draw the big house

optative.georgian: ახალგაზრდა სტუდენტებმა უნდა დახატონ დიდი მთა
optative.english: The young students should draw the big mountain

imperative.english: You all (you formal), draw the bright sun
